h1: Guidelines around Personally Identifiable Information (PII) & Asset Details

li.span: No Names or email addresses of people should be mentioned or used.
No IP Addresses, Serial Numbers, hostnames (including in text, logs screenshots) should be visible or used.
Slack Channels and Email Distribution Lists are allowed.

ul.li: Images should not be used where possible. (Reproducing environment/scenarios may not be feasible)
Images with details can be blurred using https://www.facepixelizer.com or offline screenshot/picture editor utilities.
